title: Lakshmi Kasu Haram - A Divine Statement
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality CZ diamonds and Emeralds. The gold showcases intricate filigree work.
features: This exquisite Haram features a classic Kasu design with alternating CZ diamonds and Emeralds. The centerpiece is a beautifully detailed Lakshmi pendant, a symbol of prosperity. The pendant is adorned with emeralds and diamond clusters, creating a stunning visual effect. Features antique finish nakshi work.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (CZ diamonds) with vibrant green Emerald accents. This harmonious color combination is auspicious and timeless.
occasions: and other traditional South Indian ceremonies. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for grand receptions and festive occasions.
description: A masterpiece of craftsmanship, this Lakshmi Kasu Haram embodies tradition and luxury. The intricate design and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty. Wearing this piece is a celebration of your heritage and a symbol of good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish gives it an extra layer of richness and durability.
